General.Name: Saurer Intelligent Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Saurer Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of textile machinery and components for fibre and yarn processing worldwide. The company operates through Spinning Division, Technology Division, and Data and Service Division. It also manufactures blowrooms, combers, roving frames, draw frames, and new textile machinery; ring spinning machines; rotor spinning machines and winders; and related mechanical spare parts. In addition, the company offers twisting and embroidery machines; and mechanical and spare parts. Further, it engages in the research and development, production, and sales of robots, robot systems, robot application technology, and software products; intelligent packaging machinery; and intelligent mechanical and electrical and information products, as well as provides technical consultation and technical services. The company was founded in 1853 and is based in Urumqi, China.
